data.name: Dominion - Hinterlands: 1st Edition
data.detailed_description:
Play with Duchess, Oracle, Noble Brigand, Nomad Camp, Silk Road, Cache, Embassy, Ill Gotten Gains, and Mandarin in this set of cards that were included in the original release of Hinterlands. The Hinterlands expansion first released with twenty-six sets of kingdom cards and as the game grew, a second edition was published. The second edition removed nine of the cards we know and love, and added nine new ones. For a nostalgic game, fire up the first edition with this set and play the cards that introduced you to Dominion Prosperity.


This set of cards includes those cards that were originally in the Intrigue expansion, but have been removed for second edition.

Included Cards
  • Duchess - A terminal Silver with scry
  • Oracle - Plus two cards with scry attack
  • Noble Brigand - A Treasure trashing attack
  • Nomad Camp - A terminal Silver with plus buy
  • Silk Road - Victory card that encourages greening
  • Cache - A budget Gold with on gain Copper
  • Embassy - Draw two with milling
  • Ill Gotten Gains - A flexible Treasure curser
  • Mandarin - A terminal Gold with Treasure topdecking


First edition cards can replace second edition cards, or be mixed in, however you choose to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
